016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
023
024import java.net.URI;
025import java.util.*;
026import java.util.function.Consumer;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028
029
030/**
031 * @author rickardoberg
032 */
033public record Links(ObjectNode json)
034        implements JsonElement {
035
036    public record Builder(ObjectNode builder)
037            implements With<Builder> {
038        public Builder() {
039            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
040        }
041
042        public Builder link(Consumer<Builder> consumer) {
043            consumer.accept(this);
044            return this;
045        }
046
047        public Builder link(String rel, String href) {
048            builder.set(rel, builder.textNode(href));
049            return this;
050        }
051
052        public Builder link(String rel, URI href) {
053            return link(rel, href.toASCIIString());
054        }
055
056        public Builder link(Enum<?> rel, URI href) {
057            return link(rel.name(), href);
058        }
059
060        public Builder link(String rel, String href, Meta meta) {
061            builder.set(rel, builder.objectNode()
062                    .<ObjectNode>set("href", builder.textNode(href))
063                    .set("meta", meta.json()));
064            return this;
065        }
066
067        public Builder link(String rel, URI href, Meta meta) {
068            return link(rel, href.toASCIIString(), meta);
069        }
070
071        public Links build() {
072            return new Links(builder);
073        }
074    }
075
076    private static final Pattern spaceSeparated = Pattern.compile(" ");
077
078    public boolean isEmpty() {
079        return object().isEmpty();
080    }
081
082    public Optional<Link> getSelf() {
083        return getByRel("self");
084    }
085
086    public Optional<Link> getByRel(String name) {
087        if (name == null) {
088            return Optional.empty();
089        } else {
090            String[] findRels = spaceSeparated.split(name);
091            Iterator<String> names = object().fieldNames();
092            nextRel: while (names.hasNext()) {
093                String rel = names.next();
094                String[] rels = spaceSeparated.split(rel);
095                for (String findRel : findRels) {
096                    if (!Arrays.asList(rels).contains(findRel))
097                        continue nextRel;
098                }
099                return Optional.of(new Link(rel, object().get(rel)));
100            }
101            return Optional.empty();
102        }
103    }
104
105    public List<Link> getLinks() {
106
107        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = object().fields();
108        List<Link> links = new ArrayList<>(object().size());
109        while (fields.hasNext()) {
110            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> next = fields.next();
111            links.add(new Link(next.getKey(), next.getValue()));
112        }
113        return links;
114    }
115}
